SELECT /* opPayMeanCtrlInfo.methodsOfPaymentControlList */ OPMCI.PAY_MEAN_CTRL_NO , FN_GET_CODENAME('OM031', OPMCI.DVC_GB_CD) AS DVC_GB_CD , ( CASE WHEN OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD = '10' THEN FN_GET_CODENAME('OM030', OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_NO) -- PG사인 경우 WHEN OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD = '20' THEN FN_GET_CODENAME('OM013', OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_NO) -- 결제수단인 경우 END ) AS CTRL_TGT_NO , ( CASE WHEN OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD = '10' THEN '' WHEN OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD = '20' AND OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_NO = '11' THEN FN_GET_CODENAME('OM026', OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_DTL_NO) WHEN OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD = '20' AND OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_NO = '21' THEN FN_GET_CODENAME('OM027', OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_DTL_NO) WHEN OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD = '20' AND OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_NO = '22' THEN FN_GET_CODENAME('OM027', OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_DTL_NO) END ) AS CTRL_TGT_DTL_NO , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS USE_LMT_DATE , CASE WHEN OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM > NOW() AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM > NOW() THEN '대기' WHEN OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM <= NOW() AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM >= NOW() THEN '진행' WHEN OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM < NOW() AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM < NOW() THEN '종료' END AS STATE , OPMCI.USE_YN , OPMCI.DISP_YN , OPMCI.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM OP_PAY_MEAN_CTRL_INFO OPMCI , OP_PAY_MEAN_CTRL_DTL_INFO OPMCDI
WHERE OPMCI.PAY_MEAN_CTRL_NO = OPMCDI.PAY_MEAN_CTRL_NO AND OPMCDI.CTRL_GB_CD LIKE #{ctrlGbCd} || '%' AND OPMCDI.CTRL_TGT_NO LIKE #{ctrlTgtNo} || '%' AND OPMCI.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%'
AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM > NOW() AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM > NOW()
AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM <= NOW() AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM >= NOW()
AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM < NOW() AND OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM < NOW()
ORDER BY OPMCI.PAY_MEAN_CTRL_NO
mapper.select: SELECT /* opPayMeanCtrlInfo.methodsOfPaymentControlDetail */ OPMCI.PAY_MEAN_CTRL_NO , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.USE_LMT_STR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS USE_LMT_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.USE_LMT_END_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS USE_LMT_END_DTM , OPMCI.DVC_GB_CD , OPMCI.USE_YN , OPMCI.DISP_YN , OPMCI.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.DISP_STR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(OPMCI.DISP_END_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DISP_END_DTM , OPMCI.TITLE , OPMCI.CONT FROM OP_PAY_MEAN_CTRL_INFO OPMCI WHERE OPMCI.PAY_MEAN_CTRL_NO = #{payMeanCtrlNo}
